resources.string:
This application allows access LEDs in ECD300 through the HC-06 blue tooth device connected to UART1 of ECD300.
Send GXXX to get status of designated LED, in which XXX stands for the name of LED. For example, sending GDE1 will returns that DE1 is on or off.
Send SXXX1 or SXXX0 to set state of LED, in which XXX stands for the name of LED. For example, SDE10 will turn off DE1, while SDE11 turn on DE1.
